name: suggestion-box
description: A simple anonymous feedback collector webapp

scripts.build: tsc -b && vite build && bunx zero-deploy-permissions -p src/schema.ts --output-format=sql --output-file=.permissions.sql
scripts.dev:clean: source .env && docker volume rm -f docker_zstart_solid_pgdata && rm -rf "${ZERO_REPLICA_FILE}"*

author: Alex Davis
